title: Message to President Emilio Portes Gil on Mexico's Independence Day.
text:
ON THIS memorable occasion of the celebration of the anniversary of the Independence of Mexico, I beg Your Excellency to accept in the [p.294] name of the people of the United States, as well as in my own, sincere felicitations with cordial good wishes for the prosperity of Mexico and for your personal health and happiness.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Emilio Portes Gil, The President of Mexico, Mexico City]
